summary_strategy: Reframe summary to emphasize secure cloud infrastructure delivery with measurable operational reliability, aligning directly with BlackCloak's high-stakes security mission and removing academic framing
skills_strategy: Use condensed 3-line skills format prioritizing Cloud, DevSecOps, and AI/Security Data Engineering—highlighting AWS/GCP/Azure, Docker/IaC, and RAG automation while trimming less relevant items like frontend frameworks

experience_focus.must_highlight: secure cloud deployments, infrastructure automation at scale, cross-platform endpoint remediation
experience_focus.safe_metrics_to_keep: 10,000+ devices, 25 percent compliance improvement, 200 hours saved annually
experience_focus.claims_to_avoid: no invented metrics like '30 percent reduction' unless explicitly sourced, no speculative ownership claims like 'led cross-departmental integration'

risk_controls: Replace all speculative metrics with qualitative claims if uncertain (e.g., 'reduced manual effort significantly' instead of '30 percent reduction')
Never invent responsibilities—only use actions explicitly stated in baseline resume or analysis mapping
Avoid corporate buzzwords like 'synergy', 'holistic', or 'future-proof'; use concrete verbs: built, deployed, automated, enforced
